ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a due date offset for the task template is specified where this is an active record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISBLANK( OW_task_type__c ))
&&
ISPICKVAL( OW_status__c, "Active" )
&&
ISBLANK( OW_due_date_offset__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify a due date offset
